snippet.title: Youtubers Life - Greenlight presentation video
snippet.description:
Our new game is live now on Steam Greenlight. It will be available soon for Windows, Mac and Linux.

Vote for us now! Follow this link: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=557508204

Video online creators, aka Youtubers, are a mass phenomenon nowadays. 

Millions of people are following this trend.

With Youtubers Life you can stop being just an observer and being a successful Youtuber.

Start your own online video channel and upload videos to try to catch the public attention, but keep an eye on your daily tasks while you don’t lose track of your social life. You’ll have to deal with fans, friends, family, time management and video editing skills.

Go to parties, meet new people and promote your channel, gaming, cooking or playing music are only a few of the possibilities.

Eventually your channel will grow big enough to be profitable and you’ll be able to move to a new place and manage your own video content creators network company.

Features:

- Customize your character
- Thematic channels: Gaming, Cooking, Music and many more!
- Edit videos
- Make money with your videos
- Manage your production studio
- Hang out with your friends, go to parties and assist industry events
- Search for love interests
- Answer to your fans in the social networks
- Create your own creators network
- Move to a new house, an office or even a mansion
- Decorate your place


www.youtuberslife.com
www.uplayonline.com
